name: Gonuts With Donuts
address: Dudley Senanayake Mawatha, Colombo 00800, Sri Lanka
close_time: Open 7 AM to 8 PM, 9 AM to 8 PM (Delivery)
description: When Gonuts with Donuts started off they were all the craze. Now many years down the line, the hype has died down, their prices have gone up, but they're still pretty decent.
tip: We've heard good things about their sugar drops and marshmallows.
review:
When Gonuts with Donuts started off they were all the craze. Now many years down the line, the hype has died down, their prices have gone up, but they're still pretty decent.
Gonuts is a donut chain in Sri Lanka which used to be awesome and is still pretty good. Our favorite is the hot pink love and their savory donuts are not bad either. Each donut is Rs. 95, Rs. 550 for a six pack. They also do delivery.

ගෝනට්ස් යනු ලංකාවේ ඩොනට් අලෙවි ජාලයක්. කලෙක ඉතා රසවත් වූ එහි නිෂ්පාදන දැන් වුණත් ඉතා හොඳයි. අපේ ප්‍රියතම එක උණු රෝස ආදරය හෙවත් hot pink love. ඔවුන්ගේ ලුණු හා සැර රසැති ඩෝනට් වුණත් නරක නැහැ. හැම ඩෝනට් එකක්ම රු. 95යි. ඩෝනට් හයේ පැක් එකක් රු. 550යි. ඔවුහු ඒවා ඔබේ ළඟටම ගෙනත් දෙනවා.
